events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our hiring team.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process for the software engineer role.
You have successfully passed the initial screening. The recruiter will contact you soon to discuss the next steps and schedule your technical interview.
Thank you for your prompt response. We are pleased to move forward with scheduling your technical interview with the engineering team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly for the software engineering coding challenges.
You have completed the technical interview successfully. Our team was impressed with your problem-solving skills and coding expertise.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC. This will focus on assessing your cultural fit and discussing company benefits.
Your HR interview went well, and the team is excited about the potential of you joining as a Software Engineer at our company.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive salary and benefits. Please review and respond at your convenience.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are glad that the terms meet your expectations and look forward to your final decision.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We are thrilled to welcome you onboard as a Software Engineer starting next month.
Your onboarding process has officially begun. Welcome to the team! We will guide you through all necessary setup and introductions.
The hiring process is now complete. We are excited to have you fully integrated and contributing to our engineering projects.
